    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Hopeless Night](/Equipment.aspx?ID=755)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Darkness" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=39" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is a length of wrought black iron.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=59). Each creature that ends its turn within the spell's area must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure).

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _darkness_ of the appropriate level.
